templates.name: Expired Credits/Rewards
templates.content: I'm sorry to hear your points expired! The best way to handle this is to email our team at help@cecilandlou.com and we'll be happy to help out. Please note our team's business hours are Monday - Friday 8 am - 5 pm CST.

templates.name: Escalation template
templates.content: Please note, our team's business hours are Monday - Friday 8am - 5pm CST so we will get back in touch asap once usual business hours resume on Monday.

templates.name: Can I return a sale or clearance item?
templates.content: We're sorry, sale or clearance items cannot be returned for exchange, credit, or refund. Sale and clearance items are final sale.

templates.name: I want a different monogram other than what is shown, can I do that?
templates.content: Yes, we are happy to accommodate alternate monogram options! Please make a note including the details regarding the monogram you desire in the comment box at checkout. We will contact you if your request isn't possible for any reason! Please note, monogram changes can not be made to flash sale items.

templates.name: Can I add a gift note to my order?
templates.content: We are happy to include a gift note! Please include the message you would like in the comment box at checkout.

templates.name: Restock? (autosend enabled)
templates.content: I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend checking our website and social media frequently.

templates.name: How do I use credit?
templates.content: Once logged into your account, you'll be able to access your store credit at checkout. Keep in mind that all store credits expire after 90 days.

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: Can you add a code retroactively?
templates.content: Unfortunately we're unable to add deals to orders once they're placed, apologies for any inconvenience.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG here: https://www.instagram.com/cecilandlou/

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $200. Please note that our free shipping promotion isn't valid during sales.

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a rewards/referral program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here: https://www.cecilandlou.com/pages/devoted-darlings-2

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: I'm afraid due to the custom nature of our clothing, we do not accept returns/exchanges. All sales are final. Please be sure to double-check our size guide before you purchase. Unfortunately, monogrammed or personalized items aren't returnable.

templates.name: Fabric content of the pink bow zipper pajamas
templates.content: The fabric content of the Pink Bow Zipper Pajamas is 95% cotton and 5% spandex - they also run true to size.

templates.name: Where are you located?
templates.content: We're located in Tyler, TX!

templates.name: How do I redeem my rewards points?
templates.content: You will need to log into your account, click on rewards in the top right corner, and then scroll down to the bottom to redeem your rewards. Then, simply enter the code in the promo box at checkout, and click apply.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: If you've purchased an in-stock non-monogrammed item, your order will leave us in up to 3 business days, and if you've purchased an in-stock monogrammed item, your order will leave in up to 10 business days. For pre-order shipping windows, please check the "availability" section on the product page.  We ship via USPS, and once it leaves us, you can expect first-class packages to add an additional 3-5 business days for shipping, priority mail adds 2-3 for shipping, and priority express 1-2 business days to ship.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Where are your products made/manufactured?
templates.content: We have several manufacturers and our outfits are made overseas. All orders a packaged and fulfilled at our warehouse in Tyler, TX.

templates.name: Ambassador / Influencer / Sponsorship inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! You can learn more and apply for our Influencer Program here: https://www.cecilandlou.com/influencer-program/ For other sponsorship questions, please email us directly at help@cecilandlou.com. Our team is happy to chat!

templates.name: Will a pre-order and an in stock item ship together?
templates.content: If your order includes a pre-order item and an in-stock item we'll ship the in-stock items out right away within our normal shipping times, and then your pre-order will ship within your listed shipping window.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss this is to contact us via this link: https://cecilandlouhelp.freshdesk.com/support/tickets/new Our team is happy to chat!

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Just to be sure, have you checked out the measurements in our size guide? You can do so here: https://www.cecilandlou.com/pages/size-guide Our outfits are generally true to size, but we recommend sizing up on knit PJ's and bubbles.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at help@cecilandlou.com. Our team is happy to help out! Please note, our team's business hours are Monday - Friday 8am - 5pm CST.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at help@cecilandlou.com. Our team is happy to help out! Please note, our team's business hours are Monday - Friday 8am - 5pm CST.

templates.name: Size Chart: Kids - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our kids' size chart here: https://www.cecilandlou.com/size-guide/
